sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> made from a <radical>womb</radical> must be placed upon the <kanji>land</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Why must it be placed upon the land? If it were put in water, it would dissolve too quickly. So, you put your womb building on the land, instead.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>land</kanji> around your womb building will, unfortunately, <reading>reek</reading> (<ja>りく</ja>) though.
readingInfo: It's made of biological materials, so of course it will reek.
